'''''"Reji"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. 

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Tatankasaurus Warrior: Spiritlight Chaser|text=Reji &mdash; Launch  and Leap}} while completing challenge conditions.
